name: Potion Paradise
description:
Description:

Potion Paradise is a Visual Novel, in which you take over a potion shop which has to sell potions to lots of anime girls.

This game was made in 48 hours as a submission to the Games Academy 2021 Winter Game Jam with the topic "Mix and Match".

Specs:

Genre:   Visual Novel, Point 'n' Click

Engine:  Unity

Camera Perspective:  2D

Art Style:  Anime

Platform:  PC

Controls:  Mouse
